Description: Foot (with convex edge) and stem sherd of Attic black-glazed pottery kylix; raised ring at base of stem; glazed save for outside of foot and stand-ring; inscription cut on underside.
Bibliographic references: Petrie 1886 / Naukratis. Part I., 1884-85 (pl. XXXIV, no. 498)
Bernand 1970 / Le Delta égyptien d'après les textes grecs, i: les confins libyques (p. 673, no. 317)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GA.1483)
